itemDescription: British schoolmaster, botanist, ecologist and author (1902-1974)

wikipedia_page.main: Ian Hepburn (29 May 1902 – 3 July 1974) was a British schoolmaster, botanist, ecologist and author.

response: * Ian Hepburn (190274), botanist, ecologist and author. Master for 39 years; Housemaster of Laxton House; Second Master; retired 1964. The Hepburn Music Competition is named after him.
* Ian Hepburn (190274), British schoolmaster, botanist, ecologist and author
